name: Library I
contents: We all make choices but in the end our choices make US.
author: Bioshock

name: Library II
contents: Good and bad, young and old, the things we are fighting will destroy them all Alike.
author: Beric Dondarion

name: Library III
contents: We must, fall in order to stand. Lose in order to gain, because live greatest lessons are learned through PAIN.
author: Pain
